amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to require the Comptroller General to publish the GAO Study of Rules on its website.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
